name: Large Slot Quad Adapter
customPrimary: Used along with a %s to adapt %s slot into %s ones.
customPrimaryHL: slot size adapter hull modification | a large | four small
customAncillary: The adapted slots will %s the %s's slot type, angle and arc stats. An adapted slot cannot be adapted further.
